      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Returns:
        menu's state (alive or closed)

      • readOption

        public void readOption()
        Reads user's selection

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Shows the main menu

      • executeOption

        public void executeOption()
        Executes menu's current selected option.

      • mostPlayedByClassification

        public java.lang.String mostPlayedByClassification()
        Shows the ranking by reproductions classified by {Genre or Category}. Asks the user to choose between showing the entire platform ranking, or showing only an specific producer ranking.
        Returns:
        Ranking of each classification as a String

      • buyASong

        public java.lang.String buyASong()
        Asks the user for a nickname of a consumer. Then request to the controller for a list of songs that this havent bought yet. Finally prints this list and asks the user so pick one to buy.
        Returns:
        a message with the result of the purchasing proccess

      • playAudios

        public void playAudios()
        Asks the user for a nickname of a connsumer. Then request to the controller for a list of audios which this user can play (podcasts and bought songs) and prints it. Finally, request to the user to select one of the list and simulates the reprouction of it

      • searchPlaylistById

        public java.lang.String searchPlaylistById()
        Asks the user for a playlist id, searches for that playlist at the controller and returns it as a String
        Returns:
        Playlist as a String in case it is found. A not found message otherwise.

      • removeAudioFromPlaylist

        public java.lang.String removeAudioFromPlaylist(java.lang.String nickname,
                                                Playlist selectedPlaylist)
        Lists all audios in selected playlist and asks to the user which one to delete from it.
        Parameters:
        nickname - user's nickname
        selectedPlaylist - user's selected playlist
        Returns:
        a message with the final result
